title: Jos Buivenga
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415045018/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415045018/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Jos Buivenga**

Jos Buivenga was born in 1965. He lives in Arnhem (the Netherlands) and works as a type designer. His first love for typography started to take shape at the AKA (Academy of Arts Arnhem), where he studied from 1984 - 1988. In 2004 he founded [exljbris Font Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415045018/http:/www.josbuivenga.demon.nl/).
author: Jos Buivenga
